me sambandhawa nayaka mahela jayawardhana thama wirodhaya pala kala athara eya krikat kshethraye aandolanathmaka siduwimak bawata da pathwiya.kese wethath wissayi wissa tharagawaliya 2 ‚Äì 0 lesin jayaganimin sancharaya sathutin awasan karannata shri lanka kridakayanta hakiwima krida loli sama denakutama da sathutaki.mema tharaga sancharaya samanga mahela jayawardhana test saha ekdina nayakathwayen iwath wana bawa pawasa thibu athara, me nisa eelanga nayakaya wanne kawda yanna ka atharath kuthuhalayak athi kerini.pasugiya 20 ‚Äì 20 loka kusalana tharagawaliyen pasu mahela jayawardhana 20 ‚Äì 20 nayakathwayen iwath wunu athara prabala thun iriyaw kridaka anjalo mathiws 20 ‚Äì 20 nayakaya lesa path kerini.pasugiyada nimawunu oostreliya 20 ‚Äì 20 tharaga deka jayagrahanaya kirimen 20 ‚Äì 20 nayakaya lesa wadath sarthaka wunu anjalo mathiws nayakathwaye wagakima karata ganimata sudanam bawa oppu kaleya.nayakaya kawda?

me siduwimata paya kihipayakata ihathadi, adhikaranaye peni sitima prathikshepa kirima matha wenisuwelanu nithipathiwariyage wada thahanam kerini.siya rajakariya thuladi nithipathini luyisa ortega dayas athwaradim kara athayi chodana nagunada, athamun penwadenne janadhipathiwarayage prathisanskarana salasumwalata erehiwa katha kirima hethuwen aya ilakkayak bawata pathwi athi bawaya.pasugiya sathiyedi, sorakam karana lada polis helikoptar yanayak karakas aganuwara piyasara karamin athbomba helime ha wedi thabime siddhiya sambandhayen janadhipathi maduro age wiwechanayata lakwiya.eya "thrasthawadi praharayak" lesa janadhipathiwaraya wisin handunwadenu labuwada, nithipathini ortega pawasuwe rata "rajya thrasthawadayen" batakana bawaya.adala helikoptaraya weralasanna pradeshayaka athahara dama thibiyadi aarakshaka hamuda wisin soyaganu labuwada, wenisuwelawe kathanayaka juliyo borjes pawasuwe ema siduwima mawapamak wimata ida athi bawaya.
